add_library(
    startupf401xc
    cmsisf4/Source/Templates/gcc/startup_stm32f401xc.s
    cmsisf4/Source/Templates/system_stm32f4xx.c
)
add_library(
    freertos
    freertos/queue.c
    freertos/tasks.c
    freertos/list.c
    freertos/portable/GCC/ARM_CM4F/port.c
    freertos/portable/MemMang/heap_4.c
)
